name: @roo-code/vscode-nightly
description: Nightly build for the Roo Code VSCode extension.

scripts.build: rimraf build && pnpm --filter @roo-code/build build && node esbuild.mjs --production && pnpm --filter @roo-code/vscode-webview build --mode nightly
scripts.vsix: pnpm build && cd build && mkdirp ../../../bin && npx vsce package --no-dependencies --out ../../../bin
scripts.publish:marketplace: pnpm build && cd build && vsce publish --no-dependencies
